data.message: Remember cars used to be built in flint and you couldnt drink the water in mexico....now the script has flipped thanks Killary.

replies.message: Why do you blame the Flint water crisis on Hillary?

Also cars are built in Mexico because it is so much cheaper for a company to do it. Imagine your someone who runs a car factory and will you spend 3 times more money to build cars in U.S. just because you love this damn country?
The point is democrats run Flint they've screw it up just how hilary is going to screw up the country.
Democrats have been running Flint forever. Democrats have been running New York as well. New York is the biggest and most successful city in the world.
Lol...New York is in a horrible financial mess just like IL.
